property.name: _windowProperties
property.value: {bounds={98, 29, 1103, 686}, maximized=false}

property.name: text
property.value: Test Computer Vision module.

property.name: text
property.value: Author: Elizabeth Osyk

property.name: script
note
property.value: NOTE: To see the script, invoke Open Actor

property.name: options
property.value: {"blurSize" : 15}

property.name: description
property.value:
A computer vision accessor. This accessor takes an input image, applies a computer vision transformation, and outputs the modified image.

The input may be an image or a path to a local image. Remote images are not supported due to browser security restrictions - a browser will not allow a remote image to be exported from a canvas.

This accessor uses the computer vision library from UC Irvine, https://github.com/ucisysarch/opencvjs Please cvlicense.txt in /accessor/web/hosts/browser/modules/cvlicense.txt

To run, please point your browser to: https://www.terraswarm.org/accessors/hosts/browser/demo/computervision/computervision.html

property.name: author
property.value: Sajjad Taheri (CV code), Elizabeth Osyk (accesorization)

property.name: options (parameter)
property.value: (JSON) Options for the selected transform, if any.

property.name: transform (parameter)
property.value: (string) The transform to apply to the image. Selected from a list.

property.name: input (port)
property.value: (string or image) An image or path to a local image. Remote images are not supported due to browser security restrictions - a browser will not allow a remote image to be exported from a canvas.

property.name: output (port)
property.value: (image) A modified image.

property.name: _windowProperties
property.value: {bounds={91, 179, 453, 395}, maximized=false}
